com.scandilabs.catamaran.util
Class CommonFieldValidations

java.lang.Object
  com.scandilabs.catamaran.util.CommonFieldValidations

public class CommonFieldValidations
extends Object

Framework independent validation utils. Code that depends on Spring should be put elsewhere.

Author:
mkvalsvik

Method Detail

isValidPhoneNumber

public static boolean isValidPhoneNumber(String number)
Checks whether number is a valid an properly formatted US phone number. Does not ensure that the area code is an existing one.

Parameters:
number - the phone number to check.
Returns:
true if number is in a valid format, false if not.

isValidZipCode

public static boolean isValidZipCode(String zip)
Matches: 12345, 12345-1234 Fails: 12345-12345

Parameters:
zip -
Returns:

isValidEmailAddress

public static boolean isValidEmailAddress(String email)
Checks whether email is properly formatted e-mail address. (This only checks the format, and does not check whether this is an actual or active e-mail account.)

Parameters:
email - the e-mail address to check.
Returns:
true if email is in a valid format, false if not.

isValidCompanyShortName

public static boolean isValidCompanyShortName(String name)
Checks whether name is properly formatted for a company short name (First char alphanumeric. All others alphanumeric or dash)

Parameters:
name -
Returns:
